name: Tikki. Potato, chickpea, breadcrumbs patties. Vegan, glutenfree option
description: Baked potato tikki/cutlets with leftover Chana masala, boiled potato, breadcrumbs and spices!
recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup leftover Chana masala/chole or other not too wet veggie leftovers
2 slices whole wheat bread made into crumbs or use glutenfree bread crumbs
3 cloves garlic finely chopped or minced
1 teaspoon garam masala or other fave herbs or spice blend mix
1/4 teaspoon or more rock salt (kala namak or anardana powder(pomegranate seed))

recipeInstructions.text: Mash the potatoes and leftovers to get a well mashed mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Mash the potatoes and leftovers to get a well mashed mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in all the other ingredients and mix well to get a non wet mix which can come together. Add more breadcrumbs or oats if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in all the other ingredients and mix well to get a non wet mix which can come together. Add more breadcrumbs or oats if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste the mix and adjust salt and spice.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste the mix and adjust salt and spice.

recipeInstructions.text: Form in to patties and place on parchment lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Form in to patties and place on parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated oven for 15-25 minutes depending on size and wetness of the patty. till the outside is dry and golden. You can also shallow fry the patties.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated oven for 15-25 minutes depending on size and wetness of the patty. till the outside is dry and golden. You can also shallow fry the patties.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with fave sauces, sriracha, or cilantro chutney, some side salad and a coffee or juice. You can also put these between mini buns and top with lettuce and some ketchup or miso mayo!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with fave sauces, sriracha, or cilantro chutney, some side salad and a coffee or juice. You can also put these between mini buns and top with lettuce and some ketchup or miso mayo!

keywords: easy recipe, potato dish, vegan cutlets
